welcome_message_body: Welcome to Losser, Netherlands! Get ready to experience the charm and beauty of this charming city known for its picturesque countryside and friendly locals. Enjoy your stay and explore all that Losser has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Twente Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern facilities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Twente Airport is used for freight and logistics operations, providing efficient handling and storage facilities.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stadtlohn Vreden Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Münster Osnabrück International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for charter and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
